attributes.title: Horribleeeeee
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever why did it took days to download?!! It’s so slow my phone started to glitch as soon as I open the app it doesn’t even deserve 1 start it deserves zero I don’t recommend the app

attributes.title: Worst app EVER
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app and first open it, I farted, the then said that I was a disgusting piece of crap and that trump wouldn’t want me as a supporter. I continued to look thru the app when it jump scared me with a rat in the screen and said I screamed like a toddler and LAUGHED at me. Worst app ever. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!

attributes.title: BLM 💅🏻💅🏻✨
attributes.review: What a horrible app 🤢! First of all, it made my phone glitch so bad I had to put it in rice 😾. I would seriously not recommend. This app literally sends a VIRUS onto your phone!!! Sometimes 💅🏻 I 😎 don’t 😾 want 👻 to 🥕 be 🤭 happy 😛 don’t 💔 hold 🖐🏻 it 😌 against 👾 me 🐓

attributes.title: Inappropriate use of power
attributes.review: This app gave me no ability to chose that I in fact did NOT want to vote for trump as president. Therefore I was forced to hit “next”, or “continue” even when I did not want to give my consent to do so. I was FORCED into hitting continue... SO RUDE.

attributes.title: im speechless 😡😡😡
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to show support for our pumpkin king but it took forever to download 😤. i waited for WEEKS!! then once it downloaded it forced me to watch an AD!! EXCUSE ME!!! THE AUDACITY!!! THE CAUCASITY!! also my donations werent going through 😭. how is baby trumpie going to hold his rallies now 😫 its not like hes a billionaire!! im HEARTBROKEN 💔💔💔💔

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: my phone glitched for 2 hrs after downloading this horrible app!!!!!😫if i could give this app ZERO STARS i would. completely felt like killing myself when i opened it and saw how awful the app was.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS VERY MISLEADING😤😾🚫🍊
attributes.review: i downloaded this app with the intention of finding the spiciest, most delectable spray tan recipe. when i opened the app i was met with the image of a nasty wittle cheeto🤢😡I AM SCARRED FOR LIFE!!!!🙀DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! and i looked this trump guy up and he’s actually a pretty bad person🤡 the cheeto doesn’t even know to do his job🙈🤭

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: took 10 years to downloading and i couldn’t tell where anything was it was so unorganized. also took up so my storage space my phone starting glitching and i had to get my phone fixed!!!         ❌DO NOT DOWNLOAD ❌👁👄👁

attributes.title: Would not ask my worst enemy to download this app
attributes.review: This app is took ALL WEEK to download, leaving my phone utterly useless during this time. Then when it FINALLY did download, it was useless. I would rate 0 stars it possible.

attributes.title: GLITCH!
attributes.review: it made my phone glitch so bad and i got this notification that said 3 viruses got into my phone and it didn’t let me fix it??? also it’s making my battery go down super fast.
